column3: NDS has been included in our consolidated results of operations starting on April 25, 2014, the date of acquisition.

Includes a tax provision adjustment recorded in the fourth quarter of fiscal year 2014 related to adjustments to prior years' liabilities for intercompany transfer pricing which decreased net income by $458 million and diluted earnings per share by $0.05.

Includes a charge related to a fine imposed by the European Commission in March 2013 which decreased net income by $733 million (â‚¬561 million) and diluted earnings per share by $0.09. Also includes a charge for Surface RT inventory adjustments recorded in the fourth quarter of fiscal year 2013, which decreased net income by $596 million and diluted earnings per share by $0.07.
